content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_shell" command to create a new directory called "river_data". I used the "append_to_file" command to add text to the "river.txt" file. I used the "google" command to search for
"""

[Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Tulsa, Jenks, and the Muscogee Creek National Council have approved an $8.2 million project to create a new lake in the Arkansas River corridor. The $96 million project will include a marina, a trail system, and a new reinforced shoreline to attract tourists and investors to the area. The lake will be from 71st to 101st, where the dam will hold water as deep as 10 feet. The project is dependent on reaching an agreement with the Muscogee Nation to create a Tax Increment Financing District to pay for the infrastructure.\n\nLinks: ['\\n\\n (https://www.kjrh.com/)', '7 weather alerts (https://www.kjrh.com/weather/alerts)', '1 closings/delays (https://www.kjrh.com/weather/school-closings-delays)', ' Watch Now (https://www.kjrh.com/live)', ' Watch Now (https://www.kjrh.com/live)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "lake_creation.txt", "text": "The creation of a lake along the Arkansas River corridor involves an $8.2 million project that will create a new reinforced shoreline and dam to hold water as deep as 10 feet. The project is dependent on reaching an agreement with the Muscogee Nation to create a Tax Increment Financing District to pay for the infrastructure."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your
